summary: Defines a dataset class that reads a tab‑separated file of concept identifiers and their synonym strings, tokenizes the text with a HuggingFace tokenizer up to a configurable maximum length, and supplies tokenized examples for training an entity‑linking encoder or building a nearest‑neighbor index.
business_intent: Facilitate the preparation of training and inference data for entity‑linking models within the NeMo NLP framework, streamlining model development and retrieval system construction.
